job_details.Functieomschrijving:
As a back-end engineer in the team, you'll be focusing on ensuring the scalability and reliability of the systems we've built around and integrated with our LLM (Large Language Models) infrastructure and traditional AI models.

   Alongside the services and infrastructure around our AI models the system consists of multiple separate services and databases that provide customers with the ability to upload and manage data sources within their domain, provide quality assurance functionality that provide fine grained control over the generative AI models, as well as the integration of our centralized AI platform into the rest of the CM.com product portfolio.
job_details.full_text:
Senior Back End Developer

As a back-end engineer in the team, you'll be focusing on ensuring the scalability and reliability of the systems we've built around and integrated with our LLM (Large Language Models) infrastructure and traditional AI models.

   Alongside the services and infrastructure around our AI models the system consists of multiple separate services and databases that provide customers with the ability to upload and manage data sources within their domain, provide quality assurance functionality that provide fine grained control over the generative AI models, as well as the integration of our centralized AI platform into the rest of the CM.com product portfolio.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes building and maintaining systems around LLM infrastructure and traditional AI models, focusing on user-facing applications and integrating AI platforms. This aligns with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer, particularly in developing and deploying generative AI capabilities and ensuring their integration into broader product portfolios.

job_tasks.justification: The role focuses on 'back-end engineer' responsibilities, ensuring 'scalability and reliability of the systems', and integrating AI platforms into the product portfolio, which are core software development activities.
The description mentions building and maintaining 'multiple separate services' and ensuring their integration, which falls under software development.
The role involves integrating the 'centralized AI platform into the rest of the CM.com product portfolio', a clear software development task.
job_tasks.phrase: integration of our centralized AI platform into the rest of the CM.com product portfolio

job_tasks.justification: The role explicitly mentions working with 'LLM (Large Language Models) infrastructure' and 'traditional AI models', and providing 'fine grained control over the generative AI models', indicating involvement in modeling.
The description mentions 'quality assurance functionality that provide fine grained control over the generative AI models', which implies interaction with and control over generative AI models.
job_tasks.phrase: fine grained control over the generative AI models

job_tasks.justification: The role involves enabling customers to 'upload and manage data sources within their domain', which is a data engineering task related to data ingestion and management.
job_tasks.phrase: upload and manage data sources within their domain

job_tasks.justification: The focus on 'scalability and reliability of the systems we've built around and integrated with our LLM infrastructure and traditional AI models' suggests a need for operational excellence in production environments.
job_tasks.phrase: scalability and reliability of the systems
